attributes.action: Stop 'Clogging Up' the Internet by Emailing Every Signatory to a Petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One Petition on this site had over 1.7 million signatures and I understand that you replied to all of these.

Leave our email systems open for more important purposes such as business emails that may earn the country money.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
